```{r}
#reads the data in, doesn't work rn probably due to the header currently being changed
Data <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/snehaprem03/StatProject/main/communities.data", header = T, na.rm = T)

#eliminates country and community which we said was not useful since they had lots of ?
Data <- Data %>%
  dplyr::select(-Country, -Community)
```

```{r}
data_model <- lm(X8 ~ ., data = Data)
```

```{r}
plot(data_model)
```

```{r}
plotModel(data_model)
```
